title: Golf: history and tradition
brief_description: This dramatic video takes you on a pilgrimage to the heart and home of Scotland with a rare look inside the clubhouse at St. Andrews. Treasures of the past are revealed from feathery balls and longnose clubs, to the clubs in use today. See the development of golf course architecture by visiting the famous Link Courses.
